title: Tuscan Tomato soup
directions: Heat a heavy bottom pan and pour in the olive oil, then add the onions, capers, garlic, paprika, cumin and anchovies. Fry on a high heat, stirring constsantly until the anchovies break down and disappear, then pour in the wine and allow to boil.
Pour in the tomatoes, stock, chickpeas and bread and bring to a boil.
Once the soup has boiled blend until smooth and serve.
ingredients: 1 crusty (or stale) bread roll torn into chunks
